listingsToMailsNotifCommand: mail send {{playerPseudo}} your item {{quantity}}x{{itemStack}} has expired from listings and its in your mailbox.
mailsToDeleteNotifCommand: mail send {{playerPseudo}} your item {{quantity}}x{{itemStack}} has expired from mailbox and has been deleted.

sellerItemNotifCommand: mail send {{playerPseudo}} your item {{quantity}}x{{itemStack}} has been sell for {{totalPrice}}.
